import React, { Fragment,useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../../styles/App.css"; export const Checkout = () => { const [isValid,setValid] = useState(false) const validate = () =>{ let errors = [] const inputs = document.querySelectorAll('.form-control') inputs.forEach(input =>{ !input.value ? errors.push(input) : errors.length && errors.pop() }) setValid(!erros.length) } useEffect(() =>{ validate() }) return (

Checkout



We'll never share your email with anyone else.

Confirm
); }
